attributes.comment:
To Whom it may concern:
I am writing to voice my concern on this issue of increasing the fees for
international adoption. My family and I are in the midst of waiting for a referral from
China and because of the overwhelming and wonderful demand of these children,
we will unfortunately have to pay for various fees AGAIN from the USCIS. This in
and of itself is extremely frustrating and then to hear that the fees might increase
creates even more frustration. Adopting is so expensive and I don't feel that
parents who want to adopt should be penalized for paying the already high fees,
let alone pay even higher ones, should you choose to increase the price.
Everyone seems to want a piece of the pie in America for adoption when all the
families want is their child. Please consider what I have written and help my
family and others, by not increasing the fees. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Shelly Shackelton
